subject: HI,how are you doing, I'm Ms.M
body: HI,how are you doing, I'm Ms.Mary S.Johnson,I would like to willfully entrust the rest of my monetary assets to you as I am currently on my last days in a hospital diagnosed of cancer, I needed a very honest and God fearing person, Reply back to my email box for further details, ( johnsonmarry112@ yahoo.com ) I am not always online here.

subject: Re: HI,how are you doing, I'm Ms.M
body:
Dear Sir/Madam,

I'm deeply sorry to hear about your current health situation. It's a difficult time and I understand that you're looking for someone trustworthy to handle your assets.

Best wishes,
Lawrence
